review: This game is a really fun zombie survival game and i really enjoy playing this game killing zombies/players and collecting loot. its pretty much a game for people who can not run dayz

This is and has been one of my favourite cods almost purely because of custom zombies, but the campaign is also fun and the multiplayer, although modded, is still quite decent compared to *cough* black ops 3 *cough*
Every game normally has a bad community dont let it stop u getting the game
